revisions.rev:
'''PC Safety''' is a [[toll-free telephone number]] provided by [[Microsoft]] technical support for end-users that assists customers in removing [[malware]] infections such as [[viruses]], [[spyware]] (including unwanted software), and [[adware]]. It also helps customers protect their computers by using [[Windows Firewall]], [[Windows Defender]], and [[Windows Update]].
==See also== *[[Microsoft Security Essentials]]
==External links==
* [http://www.microsoft.com/security/articles/security_resources.asp Microsoft's security resources for customers] * [http://support.microsoft.com Microsoft product support home]
[[Category:Microsoft divisions]]
